Barry Manilow came out as gay a few years ago -- a decision he pinned on fans at the time ... but now, he says he just didn't think it was a big deal to announce it to the world.

articles.title: Kim Zolciak & Kroy Biermann Enjoy Anniversary Dinner Amid Divorce - TMZ
articles.description: Kroy Biermann and Kim Zolciak, looked very much like an on-again couple this weekend as they celebrated their 12-year wedding anniversary.
articles.content:
Kim Zolciak and Kroy Biermann had a good weekend -- they were chowing down and looking awfully cozy during their 12-year anniversary ... even though they're getting divorced.
